snippet: The action by the Department of Transportation may signal an end to the Fung Wah bus service between Manhattan and Boston.
abstract: Federal Transportation Department revokes license of Fung Wah, the oldest of the so-called Chinatown-to-Boston bus services, until the company and its buses pass a detailed inspection.
lead_paragraph: The action by the Department of Transportation may signal an end to the Fung Wah bus service between Manhattan and Boston.

headline.seo: License Pulled for Operator of Chinatown Buses
headline.main: License for Operator of Chinatown Buses Is Pulled
headline.print_headline: License for Operator of Chinatown Buses Is Pulled
